titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: David Shelley Kloss III trained in the Pennsylvania Nautical Schoolship and was a member of the US. Merchant Marines.

scopecontent.p: Collection of papers documenting the career Davis S. Kloss III. Materials inlcude: graduation, appointment, license, and discharge certificates from the Merchant Marine and the Naval Reserve; Coast Guard licenses, 1968 and 1969; USN identification card; Kloss's continuous discharge book (1942-1957); VFC certificate authorizing the establishment of the Cherry Hill post; news clippings related to the scuttling of the USS Algol; and other certificates and several Merchant Marine and Pennsylvania Schoolship alumni publications. Also included in the collection are photos of David S. Kloss III, a photo of the Pennsylvania Nautical Schoolship, and a photo of the USS Cavalier.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
